meanings.definition: To like (someone or something) better than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: She prefers chocolate ice cream over vanilla.
meanings.sent2: He prefers to watch comedy movies instead of horror films.
meanings.sent3: The cat prefers to nap in the sun rather than the shade.
meanings.sent4: My dog prefers to be the center of attention at all times.
meanings.sent5: My sister prefers to read mystery novels late into the night.

meanings.definition: To give priority or precedence to (someone or something) over others.
meanings.sent1: The teacher prefers to answer questions from students who raise their hands.
meanings.sent2: He prefers to finish his work before taking a break.
meanings.sent3: The chef prefers to use fresh ingredients in his dishes.
meanings.sent4: The manager prefers to promote employees who show dedication and hard work.
meanings.sent5: She prefers to start her day with a cup of hot tea.
